name: Spheres of Influence
blurb: Solid metal spheres designed to solidify our world. Made from ultra-dense Tungsten alloy and designed to help center and connect us all

name: The SoHo Memory Project
blurb: Help me build a mobile historical society dedicated to sharing SoHo's significant and fascinating past!

name: The Sailboat: A Mobile Pop-Up Shop
blurb: Ocean & Sea (a nautical clothing brand) is dreaming to build a landlocked sailboat pop-up shop, inspiring dreamers coast to coast.

name: Wall of Fortune 2016 : A Scratch-Off Fortune Cookie Poster
blurb: Start every morning of 2016 on a positive note by scratching and revealing an inspirational Fortune.  Grab a coin and come join :)

name: The Hydro Hammock, Swinging Pool and Hydro Trampoline
blurb:
HydroHammock Hot Tub Bathtub.
Best Hammock Design Innovating Comfort for all.
New Level of Fun. Swinging cool or warm Bliss Bath.

name: Primo - Teaching programming logic to children age 4 to 7
blurb: Primo is a playful physical programming interface that teaches children programming logic without the need for literacy

name: Piper: a Minecraft Toolbox For Budding Inventors
blurb: A Minecraft toolbox for anyone to create and invent with technology. Build electronics. Invent power-ups. Create the future.

name: Skelosaurz Leather Fossils: Primeval art has evolved...
blurb: Reconstruct the past in real leather with Skelosaurz! The dinosaur skeleton kits brought back to life with primal skills & water!

name: Draft Evidence: Essays About Design & Independent Business
blurb: I’m making a book that provides clear steps on how to create a durable, sustainable solo design practice. I need your help to print it.

name: Flowers that really mean something: The Bloom Equation
blurb: Fresh blooms + the lost Victorian language of flowers = beautiful, motivational, & fun messages to puzzle. No need to be home delivery!

name: Memento Mori Tattoo
blurb: An optical illusion temporary tattoo. Point your finger at someone and remind them: "THOU ART MORTAL."

name: ___Shift : image frame
blurb: ___Shift simply stores and frames your collections, memories and inspirations, bringing appreciation to analog media.

name: Edo – Life-sized cardboard bricks: giant fun for your kids.
blurb: Eco-friendly, giant building blocks to fire up your children's imagination: castles, animals and robots all in one toy. Get yours now!

name: Periscope Kit: Submarine Not Included
blurb: Up periscope! A periscope that can be raised (and lowered). Keep an eye on the action in the street over the fence ... or cube wall.

name: The North's Urban Sauna Revival
blurb: Who wants to build, enjoy, and share transformative sauna experiences this winter—& every season following?! Sauna Society needs you.

name: Subform: A modern tool for digital product designers
blurb: Subform is CAD-inspired design tool for Mac and Windows, focused on the unique constraints of user interface design.

name: I Am Decals - Share Your Story
blurb: Personalized Decals and T-Shirts that express who you are through a collection of icons representing your interests.

name: Bruu | Moving Beer Pong Robot
blurb:
Bruu drives around the table and will not fall off.  We didn't change the game of beer pong, we made a brand new one.
Guaranteed Epic.

name: Shelter the Solo Bees
blurb: Become a hero to our native bees

name: Elegant Black-gold STEM Flashrulers
blurb: Get back to school fully prepared

name: BLACK HOLE
blurb: A true-to-scale replica of Earth's Schwarzschild Radius, the size at which Earth would become a black hole.

name: Create Wrapping paper via any Computer/Tablet & Printer
blurb: An online Wrapping Paper Design tool where anyone can create their own personalised designs, print and wrap in minutes!

name: POPMoisaic.fun: Your pictures in mosaics made of LEGO
blurb: Take your favourite photo, transform it in 1 click in a mosaic made of LEGO, see in real time the result and build it yourself.

name: neona : gamify life, promote your skills, level up!
blurb: Mentoring to build your best self through games, tech and authentic, natural guidance.

name: Explorer Cards — A Geography & Travel Trivia Game
blurb: Geojango Maps is launching our new Explorer Cards, an educational game. Discover the world while tapping into your geography knowledge!

name: ChonkerKeys | Fun & Easy Control For Video Calls & Computing
blurb: Innovative physically customizable keypads with indicator lights
